oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slave bill of sale for a girl named Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Slave bill of sale for a girl named Maria. Maria was sold to Thomas Swafford Jr. for $450 by Daniel F. Cocke. Maria is sold with the purpose of being "a slave for life" and is described as being 11 years old, "sound, healthy," and "sensible." A. Swafford and George W. Jones signed as witnesses to the sale.
